name: Space Attack: Exterminator V Pollinator Demo
name_original: Space Attack: Exterminator V Pollinator Demo
description:
The Game is still in  WIP

This is my current project am working on, it is a shoot'em up game where you battle against bees. You will need to download the game before you can play it.  If you wouldn't mind leaving a comment about your experience of the game that would be great. My goal is to see if am getting the shoot'em feel of the game.
